name: S.F. Variant
description:
In San Francisco there is a new illness and all people are infected except do you.

Your mission is to survive as long as you can.

How To Play

-You controll the player with arrows and WASD

-With E you pick up the items

-With the left mouse tast you can use the arms and with the right one you can use the shield

-With R you can change the arm

-Aim of the game is to survie as long as you can

Credits:

  • game devoloment (Alex Steiner)
  • 3D Models (https://sketchfab.com/)
  • Sound Effects (https://opengameart.org/)
